data.name: variant
data.description: Defines the visual style of the tabs. By default, the variant is set to 'pills'.

data.name: animate
data.description: Defines the speed of tab transitions. The default value is 'normal'.

data.name: borderClasses
data.description: Controls whether the border styling is applied to the tabs. Can be a boolean or a custom string for classes.

data.name: tabListClasses
data.description: Custom classes for the tab list container.

data.name: tabClasses
data.description: Custom classes for each tab element.

data.name: activeTabClasses
data.description: Custom classes applied to the active tab.

data.name: tabPanelClasses
data.description: Custom classes for each tab panel.

data.name: id
data.description: An optional unique identifier for the Tabs component.

data.name: tabs
data.description: The list of tab elements to be displayed inside the Tabs component.

data.name: panels
data.description: The list of tab panels corresponding to each tab.
